attributes.action: scrap the unnecessary and expensive Patients' Record System. The benefits are tiny compared to the £20 billion cost.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If £20 billion is available, it could be much better spent in other ways, such as providing good quality drugs on the same basis throughout the country, i.e. without postcode lottery or favour to Scotland. Maternity unit closures could be stopped and money provided for hospital cleaning. Please Mr. Blair: spend on saving lives, not on IT projects.
